title: Behind the Menu
abstract: Food preparation, farm work & industry knowledge help to serve up the food we love.
description: This collection of works shows from the farm to the table, the labour of love that is needed in the preparation and consumption of food and milk. Harvest time for grapes in the Mallee, happy mums serving Margarine, Industrial large-scale food preparation and an interview with an industry expert, Dur-e Dara.
